title: Viral pharyngitis

fields.name: hydration_advice
fields.label: Hydration advice
fields.default: Warm fluids, honey, and throat lozenges may help.

body:
You were treated today for viral pharyngitis (sore throat).

Pain control:
{{analgesia}}

{{#if hydration_advice}}Hydration and comfort: {{hydration_advice}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Difficulty breathing or swallowing saliva
- Persistent high fever or worsening throat pain
- Neck swelling or inability to open the mouth

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
